solution_line_template: John runs at {dog_run_speed} miles per hour for {dog_run_time} hours, for a distance of {dog_run_speed}*{dog_run_time}=<<{dog_run_speed}*{dog_run_time}={dog_run_distance}>>{dog_run_distance} miles.

Then John runs at {solo_run_speed} miles per hour for {solo_run_time} hours, for a distance of {solo_run_speed}*{solo_run_time}=<<{solo_run_speed}*{solo_run_time}={solo_run_distance}>>{solo_run_distance} miles.
